dialogue.text: After a few days of planning, Skelly decided to go out and find the haunted mansion.
When she got there, she stared at the large wooden doors in front of her.
The gray brick walls are cracked by the vines that grow along them, and the windows are faded and broken.
Hesitantly, she opens the doors. They produce a loud creaking sound.
Got damn, these door hinges need some WD40. Anyways, this place seems abandoned too, so I should be fine.
Skelly carefully walks across the dusty \nhallway, taking note of the paintings hung up on the wall.
Huh, these seem interesting. I wonder who used to li-
Wait, did the eyes of that one just move?-
She stares at the painting...
I'm going to assume that's just my paranoia getting to me, considering what happened last week...
Even slower than before, she makes her way toward the end of the hallway and slightly peers out into the main stairway room.
Phew... See, that wasn't so ba-
BOO!!
AAAAHH!!
Hahaha, we got you!
The ghost and the star continue giggling as Skell grounds herself again.
Great. This is the second time I go to an abandoned building just to get jumpscared.
We haven't seen anyone come in here who isn't dead for a long time. Who are you?
O-Oh, I'm Skelly. You gave me a bit of a fright there.
You walked into a spooky haunted mansion, silly! Of course you were gonna get spooked.
I'm Mayuka by the way, and this is my little power star friend named Azur!
It's nice to meet you too. My apologies for intruding, I thought this place was abandoned and thought it would be fun to explore.
N-no need to apologize, we like visitors! Cats and ghosts come here all the time!
I can see that, haha. As long as they're harmless it's pretty neat.
Well, not exactly... hehehe.
Skelly dismisses this. they seem pretty \nharmless, after all.
Mayuka's little star friend taps on their shoulder.
Oh, what were you saying, Azur?
The star produces echoed unintelligible \nwhispering noises.
Oh! Azur wants to know a bit more about you!
Hmmmm... Well, do you like singing?
O-Oh- That is a random question, but I'm not sure. I've never really tried doing it in front of anyone before.
Thats okay! I just thought it would be fun to sing a bit more about myself.
Azur whispers again with a happy expression. Skelly assumes that they like the idea.
I guess I could try to sing with you... I'm kind of new to this so maybe start off a bit slow. I think I have a song in mind!
Sounds great! Let's go!
